title: conferred on me by section 1(3) of the Judicial Appointments Commission Act
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Judicial Appointments Commission Act
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Judicial Appointments Commission Act 

2023 (Commencement) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited judicial appointment commission act 2023 (commencement) order 2024

title: conferred on me by section 1(3) of the Judicial Appointments Commission Act
heading: In this Order, “Act of 2023” means the Judicial Appointments
text_raw:
2. 

In this Order, “Act of 2023” means the Judicial Appointments 

Commission Act 2023 (No. 33 of 2023).
text_norm: 2 order act 2023 mean judicial appointment commission act 2023 (no 33 2023)

title: conferred on me by section 1(3) of the Judicial Appointments Commission Act
heading: 4. The 15th day of June 2024 is appointed as the day on which section 67
text_raw:
4. The 15th day of June 2024 is appointed as the day on which section 67 

of the Act of 2023 shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

20 March, 2024. 

HELEN MCENTEE, 
Minister for Justice. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 29th March, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [114] 3
text_norm: 4 15th day june 2024 appointed day section 67 act 2023 shall come operation given official seal 20 march 2024 helen mcentee minister justice notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 29th march 2024 114 3

title: conferred on me by section 1(3) of the Judicial Appointments Commission Act
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order appoints 27 March 2024 as the day on which provisions contained 
in Parts 1, 2 and 3 of the Judicial Appointments Commission Act 2023 come 
into operation. The Order also appoints 15 June 2024 as the day on which 
section 67 of the Act comes into operation. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [114]
